titleStmt.title: The female vertuoso's a comedy : as it is acted at the Queen's Theatre, by Their Majesties servants / written by Mr. Thomas Wright.
titleStmt.author: Wright, Thomas, fl. 1693.
Molière, 1622-1673. Femmes savantes.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Wilde for R. Vincent ...,

notesStmt.note: In part an adaptation of Molière's "Les femmes savan'tes."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
